      • getTopKEdges

        public java.util.ArrayList<pair.Pair<BNNode,BNNode>> getTopKEdges(int k,
                                                         BNNode child,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<BNNode> nodes)
        For a given child node, this method will find the top k edges between other nodes to this child scored by the KL-Divergence of the joint probability of the two nodes between the training data and data generated by the Bayes net
        Parameters:
        k - number of edges to return
        child - the child edge for which we need to find k parents
        nodes - all nodes to be considered
        Returns:
        k edges to this child

      • calculateKLDivergence

        public java.lang.Double calculateKLDivergence(pair.Pair<BNNode,BNNode> edge)
        Calculate the KL-Divergence for the joint probability of two attributes between the training data set and the current bayes net. This method calculates:

        KL( P_data(A,B) || P_net(A,B) )
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge A -> B
        Returns:
        the KL-divergence for these two attributes
